pullrequest.title: Keep the playmode combo box in sync with the current playmode, fixes #22

content.raw:
Thanks for the fix!

It looks like the current playmode is received along with the `GameState`, could we just use this callback to update the combo box as well?

On another though, related to issue#23, we could just get rid of the text displaying the play mode as you suggested. Then instead of `SetPlaymode` updating that, it would just update the combo box. How does that sound?
